Constructor for initializing an error message indicating the deadline has expired.

<Note>
  `DeadlineOverLimitError` extends `PermissionBuilderError`, see the docs for
  PermissionBuilderError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { DeadlineOverLimitError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### deadline

`number`
The expired deadline timestamp
